node.title: 'I just want to be with him': Love conquers all as couples reunite
node.description: Christmas wishes have been granted across Queensland today as couples separated by seas and states reunite again on the Gold and Sunshine coasts.
node.content:
["In Queensland today, love really is all around.", "Continents, visa paperwork and a pandemic kept Emma Bertilsson and Tyrone Alderson apart for months.", "But, just weeks before Christmas, the pair left the Gold Coast airport this morning with\u00a0everything they needed \u2014 each other.", "\"Thanks Santa, I couldn't want anything else,\" Mr Alderson said.", "The pair had been living\u00a0overseas together, but could not be reunited until Ms Bertilsson's\u00a0paperwork was finalised in Australia.", "", "
Ms Bertilsson and Mr Alderson reunited at\u00a0Gold Coast Airport.(ABC News: Ellie Grounds)
", "After waiting in Sydney for Queensland's borders to reopen, she landed on the Gold Coast this morning.", "\"We were in Sweden together and getting the partner visa and getting flights back to Australia \u2014\u00a0it was such a mission. Finally getting Emma over, it's been this huge feat, and this is\u00a0the last little hurdle,\" Mr Alderson\u00a0said.", "Ms Bertilsson said once the flight landed from Sydney on Monday morning,\u00a0passengers were busting to get out the doors.", "And their plans now they are reunited?", "\"I just want to be with him, just be together,\" Ms Bertilsson said.", "
Sleepless nights for family awaiting arrivals
", "Lesley Porter saw her son Gregg for the first time in two years this morning.\u00a0", "She arrived early and\u00a0was dressed up for the occasion to make sure he \"wouldn't miss me in the crowd\".", "After a hug from his mum, Mr Porter sorted out his priorities for the rest of the day.\u00a0\u00a0", "\"Go home, dirty laundry, raid the pantry, have a look at the fridge, go for a beach run,\" Mr Porter said.\u00a0", "
Similar scenes echoed across the state
", "The McGree family was\u00a0eager to get down to New South Wales, catching the first flight of the day out of the Sunshine Coast Airport.", "Belinda McGree said it had been twelve months since their last trip was cut disappointingly short and the family was forced into quarantine for Christmas after a COVID-19 outbreak north of Sydney.", "\"We stayed in the house for two weeks and had our first Christmas without anyone else and not being able to walk out the door,\" she said.", "\"So, this time, we're a bit nervous but so excited.\"", "The McGrees chose to fly instead of drive so they could spend\u00a0time with family earlier than originally planned.", "", "
Monica Pienaar and Tommy Pienaar embrace after a long time apart.(ABC News: Amy Sheehan)
", "Waiting on the other side of the Sunshine Coast Airport terminal were\u00a0Monica and George Pienaar.", "The couple from Traveston, near Gympie, were waiting for the arrival of their son Tommy who had been stuck in New South Wales for eight months.", "\"It'll be a bit emotional to see him again;\u00a0it's been a very long time,\" Ms Pienaar said.", "\"He's first-year uni and we thought we'll be able to go and see him often, but it didn't happen like that.", "\"So, eight months is a long time.\"", "
Drivers first in line to cross
", "Just after 1am, Chris O'Connor from Buds Beach received a call many parents have been waiting for.\u00a0", "\"At 1:15am\u00a0I had a phone call saying, 'We're here,'\"\u00a0she said.", "", "
Traffic flowed steadily at the Griffith Street checkpoint.\u00a0(ABC News: Dominic Cansdale)
", "Her son and granddaughter drove from Melbourne\u00a0and were among the first to cross the border this morning.", "\"They'll be here for quite a time, and we'll have Christmas together now,\" she said.", "
Traffic moving well
", "A steady flow of traffic meant Queensland police were checking all border passes of those entering Queensland this morning.", "Acting Chief Superintendent Rhys Wildman said officers could move to random checks in the future.", "", "
Rhys Wildman says the level of compliance has been \"fantastic\".(ABC News: Ellie Grounds)
", "\"Obviously, we have the ability to move to a more of a risk-based approached.\"", "Acting Chief Superintendent Wildman said compliance at the border had been \"fantastic\" and police had turned around about 10 people before peak hour.", "
Locals want things to go 'back to normal'
", "Jenny Were has been holidaying in Coolangatta every year for the past 20 years.", "But she said this year has been different.", "\u201cThis sense of unknowing, like you can\u2019t really plan a holiday,\u201d Ms Were said.", "", "
Vojrslav Nikolich provides musical accompaniment at a border checkpoint.(ABC Gold Coast: Dominic Cansdale)
", "\u201cYou see a lot of businesses that you usually go to that you hope are only just closed in the interim and will open again.", "\u201cI feel for the border towns'\u00a0they\u2019ve been very divided [but] I think that things will go back to normal.\u201d", "Meanwhile, 76-year-old local Vojrslav Nikolich said the checkpoints have left locals feeling divided and \u201cmiserable\u201d.", "\u201cWe need each other to support each other,\u201d he said."]
